page.title: 08EDUCATION SCHOOL PRIMARY
page.content: At Kibworth Primary School we have lots of clubs involving most of the upper juniors and some of the lower juniors.There is an orchestra and two choirs both taken by Mrs.Powell.On Tuesday there is netball taken by Mrs. Mettrick after school,3.30-4.30,and football or cricket for the boys.Gym is on Wednesday taken by Mr. Childs who is a sports teacher. Mr. Hardwick on Thursdays takes a drama club for any upper juniors who are interested. Also Mr. Harding on Thursdays takes a roller-booting session for the 3rd and 4th year juniors and the 1st year High School children. On Fridays Mrs. Mettrick takes a dance club just for the 4th year juniors 3.30-4.30.
